personal_info.summary: For 23 years I started my professional career, during this time I occupied positions of direction, management and supervision of Technology teams in Brazil and Latin America. In the last 4 years, I have structured a project office, with the objective of mainly supporting technology projects to update and reduce IT TCO (infrastructure / systems) replacement of servers, terrestrial and satellite telecommunication systems and links, E- commerce integration with marketing place (B2W, Amazon and others) and with satisfactory result, the experience has spread to other areas and business units.In previous companies, the development and approval of Budgets, Forcastes (CAPEX and OPEX), structured systems / infrastructure / telecommunication technology teams, asset management software and hardware, projects, strategic planning and processes, deployment of technologies in high availability heterogeneous environments in cloud computing, storage sun switch, virtualization (VMware and Hyper V) server architectures in mission critical solutions, outsourcing, insourcing, Datacenters, information security and SOX and ITIL based controls, Software Architecture, Database.Fluent English - Interchange 2000 - Toronto Canada.Advanced Spanish and native Portuguese.
